name: Peanut n Jelly
description:
Made in 3 1/2 days for the Wowie Jam with the theme Collaborate. You control Peanut and help Jelly figure out who to shoot. Get upgrades to survive 3 minutes in endless increasing difficult levels.

Controls
  • Move: Arrows/WASD
  • Select: Enter/Space
  • Restart: R
Credit
  • Programmer: PepperBoi
  • Artist: JamalCreates
  • Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
  • SFX: Kenny, https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
